channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump enacted dozens of Project 2025 goals. Here's what's left
item.description: The Heritage Foundation's Project 2025 was a campaign trail boogeyman for President Trump , but much of it became reality during his first year back i...

item.title: Charted: The sharp decline in federal employment
item.description: Data: Bureau of Labor Statistics; Chart: Axios Visuals There are 271,000 fewer federal employees than there were at the start of 2025 — about a 9% dro...

item.title: Prognosticating in 1999: Revisiting turn-of-the-millennium predictions
item.description: U.S. adults surveyed in 1999 correctly predicted major shifts for the half-century ahead: the election of a Black U.S. president , civilian travel to ...

item.title: AI in 2026: 'Show me the money"
item.description: The AI model maker race will continue in 2026, along with more agents and a growing pressure on companies to prove AI can pay off in the real world, e...

item.title: How Trump's agenda lands at the Supreme Court in 2026
item.description: The Supreme Court has many pivotal cases lined up for the coming year, many revolving around President Trump 's policies. The big picture: Trump has r...

item.title: Trump is reconstituting the Fine Arts panel set to review his ballroom
item.description: The White House is seeking members likely to clear the way for President Donald Trump’s controversial ballroom and other projects.

item.title: White House lays out nine-week timeline to win approval for Trump’s ballroom
item.description: Trump is seeking to gain approvals for his ballroom in just over two months that have taken other large projects years to complete.

item.title: She provides the raw material to Trump’s influencer machine
item.description: Margo Martin, a lesser-known member of the president’s staff, fuels social media with a blitz of Trump content.

item.title: New York City Mayor Zohran Mamdani is sworn in at public ceremony
item.description: Zohran Mamdani, the first Muslim mayor of New York City, was sworn in Thursday, marking a generational shift in the city’s leadership with his promise...

item.title: Chief justice says rule of law is strong at time of rising concerns
item.description: Chief Justice John Roberts said in his annual year-end report on the judiciary that the nation’s founding charters remain robust.

item.title: Ex-Trump voters swung hard to Democrats over costs in NJ & VA, new research shows
item.description: Voters who backed Donald Trump in 2024 and swung to Democrats in this year's Virginia and New Jersey elections did so over economic concerns, accordin...

item.title: Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
item.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

item.title: Democrats think they’ve found their 2026 message — and Miami just backed it up
item.description: In races across the country, Democrats focused on promises to make life more affordable — even as they offered contrasting approaches.

item.title: Voters sour on Trump’s handling of the economy in new poll
item.description: The White House plans to make affordability a key selling point for Republicans across the board as the 2026 midterm elections come into focus.

item.title: Trump will again test ‘blame Democrats’ message on the economy — this time at a casino
item.description: President Donald Trump will give a speech in Northeastern Pennsylvania on Tuesday, the first stop in a ‘tour’ where he will talk about affordability c...

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
